articles.title: In photos: Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe shot
articles.description: Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe has been rushed to hospital after he was shot in the chest during a speech in Nara, Japan
articles.content:
Former Prime Minister Shinzo Abe speaks moments before being shot in front of Yamato-Saidaiji Station in Nara, Japan, on July 8.
Updated 9:18 AM ET, Fri July 8, 2022

articles.title: Hear former Shinzo Abe adviser's reaction to assassination - CNN Video
articles.description: Akihisa Shiozaki, a former senior adviser to former Japanese Prime Minister Abe, talks with CNN's John Berman about his former boss. Japan's former Prime Minister Shinzo Abe has died at the age of 67 after being shot during a campaign speech in Nara, Japan, a…

articles.author: Donald Judd, CNN
articles.title: Biden to sign executive order Friday aimed at safeguarding abortion rights
articles.description: President Joe Biden will sign an executive order Friday aimed at protecting abortion rights in response to the landmark decision by the Supreme Court overturning Roe v. Wade.

articles.title: Video shows moment Shinzo Abe was shot - CNN Video
articles.description: Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe died after being shot while giving a campaign speech on a street in central Japan.

articles.author: CNN Staff
articles.title: Who was Shinzo Abe, the former Japanese Prime Minister?
articles.description: Japan's former Prime Minister Shinzo Abe has died after being shot during a campaign speech Friday in Nara, central Japan. He was 67.

articles.author: Jeremy Diamond
articles.title: White House 'shocked and saddened' over Abe shooting
articles.description: The White House is "shocked and saddened to hear about the violent attack against former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe," a White House spokesperson tells CNN.
articles.content:
The White House is shocked and saddened to hear about the violent attack against former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, a White House spokesperson tells CNN.

articles.title: Former Japanese PM Shinzo Abe hospitalized after shooting
articles.description: Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe has been rushed to hospital after he was shot in the chest during a speech in Nara, Japan, public broadcaster NHK reported, citing an official of the Liberal Democratic Party Abe faction.
articles.content:

articles.title: Live updates: Shinzo Abe hospitalized after shooting in Japan
articles.description: Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe has been rushed to hospital after he was shot in the chest during a speech in Nara, Japan, public broadcaster NHK reported, citing an official of the Liberal Democratic Party Abe faction.
articles.content:
The shooting of Shinzo Abe has shocked Japan, which has one of the lowest rates of gun crime in the world due to its extremely strict gun control laws.

articles.title: Live updates: Shinzo Abe shot dead in Japan
articles.description: Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe has died after being shot during a speech in Nara, Japan. Follow here for live updates.

articles.title: New York Post: Father of Highland Park gunman wants his son to serve a 'long' sentence
articles.description: Days after a gunman killed seven and wounded dozens more in a rampage at a Fourth of July parade in Highland Park, Illinois, the shooter's father told the New York Post he wants his son to serve a long prison sentence.
